issue_description:
# [BUG]: Full text doesn't fit in the carousel item on the Volunteer page

### Describe the bug

When accessing Volunteer Page from the iOS devise, if the text is too long, it doesn't fit.

### URL of the page where the issue is observed.

https://www.oppia.org/volunteer

### Steps To Reproduce

1. Open https://www.oppia.org/volunteer
2. Scroll down to Volunteers

### Expected Behavior

The whole text fits in the carousel item

### Screenshots/Videos

![IMG_8771](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/assets/142705189/4b6059c5-dea4-4503-804f-e0401ea20050)
![IMG_8772](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/assets/142705189/7cd0b96a-d07b-467a-ab80-31fe599000da)
![IMG_8773](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/assets/142705189/c692db3a-af65-4aa8-8af6-28599f5f84ef)
![IMG_8774](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/assets/142705189/3e6bbfac-4da2-4bc4-abe9-c51a27699c9a)


### What device are you using?

Mobile

### Operating System

MacOS

### What browsers are you seeing the problem on?

Chrome

### Browser version

126.0.6478.54

### Additional context

_No response_

### Tips for developers

Before addressing the bug, please identify which PR caused the issue (you can follow the steps [here](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/How-to-find-the-commit-which-introduced-a-bug)). If you identify the PR, comment on the issue with a link to it. If not, mention the commit hash of the oldest commit you saw the bug on (and the month and year it was made in).

Then, please leave a comment with details of the approach that you plan to take to fix the issue (see [example](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/issues/19157#issuecomment-1858788463)).

**Note:** If this is your first Oppia issue, please make sure to follow our guidelines for [choosing an issue](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/Contributing-code-to-Oppia#choosing-a-good-first-issue) and [setting things up](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/Contributing-code-to-Oppia#setting-things-up). You will also need to show a demo of the fix working correctly on your local machine. Thanks!

issue_comments.body:
Hello @natashabag,
May you please assign this issue to me, so that I can start working on this issue?

@navyansh007  Per the guidance at https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/Contributing-code-to-Oppia#choosing-a-good-first-issue, please provide an explanation of what your PR will do (with names of files you're changing, what you plan to change in each file, etc.). If it looks good, we can assign you to this issue.

Please also follow the other instructions on that wiki page if you have not yet done so. Thanks!

@natashabag 
May you please assign this issue to me, so that I can start working on this issue?

@Santoshpatel112  Per the guidance at https://github.com/oppia/oppia/wiki/Contributing-code-to-Oppia#choosing-a-good-first-issue, please provide an explanation of what your PR will do (with names of files you're changing, what you plan to change in each file, etc.). If it looks good, we can assign you to this issue.

Please also follow the other instructions on that wiki page if you have not yet done so. Thanks!
Arrenge the latter in last is not well basically i do each line are showing equal

Hello @natashabag,

PR Summary
Padding in the carousel item has not been given properly

File to be changed:
453: volunteer-page.component.html

Changes to be made : 
padding: 2em

Can you assign me this issue so that i can start working on this issue?
@VijeshVS If you'd like to take up this issue, would you please show a video demonstrating that your changes result in this working correctly on both mobile and desktop in your local machine? Thanks.

Hey @seanlip 
Does this approach work for you?
https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/c56d8af8-76b5-4359-a0d0-c305da70aea0
Can I please be assigned this issue?

Hi @seanlip @natashabag. I have fixed the issue of content not fitting. While fixing it, I observed another issue in this volunteer card. The navigation dashes at the bottom of card were not visible. I have fixed that as well. I have attached the screenshots of some volunteer cards. My approach :- The height of the carousel item was fixed, I removed that. I changed the color of navigation dashes and the opacity. Can you please assign this issue to me?
@AkashPaloju Could you PTAL at this issue and fix or assign as appropriate? Thanks.

Hi all, I apologize for not notifying on this(I'm not aware of this!). The card has been redesigned in this [PR](https://github.com/oppia/oppia/pull/20667) and this issue no longer exists on the updated volunteer page UI. We can consider this resolved.

Also @samyak-jain-12 @mannika763 , I wonder how do your cards have the "author and team name" at the right of the card.  A general tip: Please update your branches before attempting to solve any issue.
Thanks!
Thanks for the tip @AkashPaloju. I wanted to ask one thing. Can I make a PR before being assigned the issue or I can only work on the issue if I am the assignee.
